title: Update Glitch
body: I recently played a game of URF, then all of a sudden the client shut down and said it needed to restore itself to an older version. I proceeded to do that, but then it said that there was an error updating the client. I kept restarting the client but the message remained the same. Any tips on what to do to fix it?

replies.body: Hmmmm it sounds like you might have been hit by the strange patcher loop issues that we had overnight and earlier this morning. Let me know if you're still having problems getting signed in, as most players have been able to by this point.
